com.rohitsood.urlybird.data
Interface DBProxy

public interface DBProxy

This is a proxy for the DBMain implementation class Interfaces here will take in business objects and translate accordingly This class is the facade for the DB implementation Both the server and client use this class to communicate with the database Both the client and the server work with the business objects

Author:
Rohit Sood
